top_choose_group.title: English courses in Lviv by British English

first.title: Application
first.description: Fill out the application below and our managers will contact you
first.description_kids: We will tell you about the training and answer all your questions.

second.title: Level test
second.description: Take our online test to determine your level
second.description_one: Children aged 6-10 are tested by teachers, the date and time are agreed upon during the consultation.
second.description_two: Children aged 11-12 can take the test online:

third.description: We will offer training program options and select a convenient class schedule
third.description_kids: Our managers will help you choose the best course for your child.

fourth.description: You will get access to your personal account, where you will have all the information about the course and your progress in learning
fourth.description_kids: It remains to wait for the start date of the course, and the child can start studying!

how_to_sign.how_to_sign: How do I sign up for an English course?
how_to_sign.how_to_sign_kids: How do I enroll my child in English?

group_form.let_choose: Let us find a group for you!

group_form.agree_personal: Consent to the processing of personal data

format_of_learning.title: English courses in 2 formats
format_of_learning.subtitle: English for children at our center is taught in small groups of 8 or 10 students
format_of_learning.online_description: Classes in online groups are held in the format of Zoom conferences using a permanent link that is valid for your group
format_of_learning.offline_description: If you want to attend English courses in Kyiv, we invite you to our center at 13/2-b Yaroslaviv Val Street.

how_take_place.title: How classes are held at our English language school
how_take_place.ten_students: In a group of 8 or 10 students
how_take_place.online: Online via Zoom or offline at our center
how_take_place.adaptive: Programs adapted to the age and goals of students
how_take_place.reviewed: Based on proven textbooks and author's materials

our_teachers.experienced_desc: with at least 3 years of teaching experience
our_teachers.qualified_desc: have international teaching qualifications: CELTA, DELTA, CELT-P, CELT-S, IHCYLT, TYLEC, TKT
our_teachers.unique_desc: undergo strict selection and regular monitoring
our_teachers.universal_desc: run different programs and age groups offline and online

test_action.desc: Want to find out your level right now? Take our test and find out which training programs are right for you!

why_is_best.title: Why British School is the best English language school
why_is_best.program_desc: English Language Improvement Program, Spoken English, Exam Preparation, EIT Preparation, Business and Legal English courses and our other programs
why_is_best.missed_classes_desc: In case of missing 3 or more classes, we will organize free practice with a teacher for you
why_is_best.control_desc: It is important to us that our English courses bring you real results. That's why we conduct placement tests after each module and send regular feedback to parents in our children's and teenage groups.
why_is_best.speaking_club_desc: On Saturdays and Sundays, you can attend our specialized speaking clubs on various topics for free
why_is_best.menager_desc: Each student is assigned a personal manager to whom you can ask any questions about your English course
why_is_best.space: Educational space in the center of Kyiv
why_is_best.space_desc: It is very convenient to get to us - we are located 5 minutes from the Zoloti Vorota metro station

subscribe.title: Subscribe to the newsletter
subscribe.subtitle: Vocabulary, tips and articles on learning English

footer.official: 2009-2023 Official training center in Ukraine, license #52374
footer.address: Kyiv, 01054, Ukraine, 13/2-B Yaroslaviv Val St., office 39. The nearest metro station is Zoloti Vorota
